dict.acceptation: 打点于；散布于；点缀；以小圆点标出；

sent.orig: Dot-IGSS,similar to Dot-ELISA,is easy to manipulate and the result is easy to interpret.
sent.trans: 与Dot－ELISA相比，Dot－IGSS具有操作简便、容易判断结果等优点，还具有更高的敏感性和特异性，且不使用酶反应底物。

sent.orig: Objective:To study the superiority significance of DFA and DOT in detection chlamydia trachomatis.
sent.trans: 目的：比较克隆荧光抗体染色法(DFA)与金标免疫斑点法(DOT)检测沙眼衣原体的优越性。

sent.orig: Approved by DOT and Certificate of Approval from Lloyds Register of Shipping.
sent.trans: DOT认证和英国劳埃德船级社认证。

sent.orig: In this paper, the results of dot-immunobinding assay (DIA) in the diagnosis of toxoplasmosis were reported.
sent.trans: 以弓形体可溶性抗原进行斑点免疫结合试验(Dot-Immunobinding Assay,DIA),检测16份弓形体病人血清，结果全部阳性。

sent.orig: DOT is the Department of Transportation in the United States.
